location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Nicholas Hankey Smith, Resident at Bushire to John Elphinstone, Accountant General, Bombay and Alexander Hay, Military Auditor General

mods.abstract: The letter outlines an issue the Resident has with paying a regiment of Sepoys stationed at Bushire; the Batta money he believes they should receive will not cover the provisions they are entitled to in lieu of payment, as the cost of goods are higher than in India. He requests instructions on whether or not he should meet the shortfall.
